title: The mistaken lover; or, The supposed ungrateful creature, appears a true pattern of loyalty. Alas I in vain he did complain, and counted her his foe; concluding she would cruel be, but it was nothing so. To an excellent new tune, sung at court. This may be printed, R.P.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for C[harles]. Dennisson, at the Stationers-Arms with in Aldgate.,
